description: Explore the legal intricacies of blockchain project funding and intellectual property protection with this comprehensive guide. Understand the challenges and best practices for securing innovations in the blockchain industry.
keywords: blockchain, project funding, intellectual property, legal perspective, patents, copyrights, trademarks, trade secrets, ICOs, STOs, DAOs, NFTs, smart contracts
title: Navigating Blockchain Project Funding and Intellectual Property: A Legal Perspective
